title: 01/04/21 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 01/04/21 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reacts to Eagles head coach Doug Pederson benching QB Jalen Hurts against Washington with playoff implications on the line. He also explains why the Browns should be happy about making the playoffs but they don’t feel like a real contender. Colin shares where he was right and wrong after the College Football Semifinal and the last week of the NFL regular season. He talks to Super Bowl Champion Trent Dilfer about Tua Tagovailoa struggling at the end of the season resulting in the Dolphins missing the playoffs.    

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
